column4:

These chunky trees can be displayed together or separately and are perfect for a primitive, winter collection. The large tree measures 7.5" high by 5" wide, while the small tree is 5.25" tall by 3.5" wide.

The triangular trees are attached together and stand 9.5" tall by 6" across and 2.5" deep. This unique, winter sitter is ideal for a rustic Christmas collection.

- Size: 9.5" H x 6" x W x 2.5" D

"have a happy snowy Christmas" or, "live well - life is short - advice from a snowman" in red and black text. It is accented by plaid and a snowman head illustration. column1: Snuggle Season Buffalo Check Mug Circle Easel Sign
column4:
The Snuggle Season Buffalo Check Mug Circle Easel Sign will bring a little warmth and charm to a variety of Winter farmhouse displays. This circular wooden sign reads ‘Snuggle Season’ in black text and has a white finish with lightly distressed edges. It sports an adorable wooden cutout of a red and black buffalo check mug with a pretty white snowflake cutout. This sign has an easel back for sitting on tables, trays, shelves and more as well as a D-Ring hanger for easy hanging. This sign looks great with red berry Winter florals, buffalo check candles and more! Measures 4" Dia. With a .25" depth.
Material: Wood
Size: 4" Dia. x .25" Dp.
Colors: White, black, red
D-Ring hanger & Easel back

column1: Natural Wood Oval Bead Candle Ring
column4:
The Natural Wood Oval Bead Candle Ring will naturally spice up any candle. This candle ring has smaller rounded beads paired with larger oval beads. It will add texture and simple beauty to a variety of candles. The overall candle ring has a 3" inside diameter and the large beads measure .75" in diameter with a 1" length.
Material: Wood
Size: 3" Inside Dia.
Large beads .75" Dia X 1" L.
Color: Wood

column1: Welcome To Our Warm & Cozy Home Wooden House Sitter
column4:
The Welcome To Our Warm & Cozy Home Wooden House Sitter is a lovely way to welcome wintertime visitors to the farmhouse. This freestanding wooden sitter has black, plaid-style stripes over a distressed white background. It reads "Welcome To Our Warm & Cozy Home" in black text and script. The house is topped with a natural wood roof and has raw wooden edges. This sitter would look lovely in foyers or atop the mantle where it can offer its warm welcoming message. Measures 10" high by 7" wide with a 1.25" depth.
Material: Wood
Size: 10" H x 7" W x 1.25" Dp.
Colors: White, black, wood

The Cream Harvest Pumpkin Chunky Sitter will add a little depth and simple beauty to Autumn trays, shelves and more. This pumpkin sitter has distressed edges on a cream finish. It is topped with a jute bow around a natural wood stem. The pumpkin bears a metal plate reading "harvest" in its dimensional center section. Group this chunky sitter with a variety of other pumpkins for a fun harvest display. Measures 6" high by 4.75" wide by 1.5" deep.
Material: Wood, metal, jute
Size: 6" H x 4.75" W x 1.5" Dp.
Colors: Cream, brown, silver, black

column1: Holiday Script Red Word Block, 4 Asstd.
column4:
The Holiday Script Red Word Block assortment is an easy way to bring lovely sentiments to the farmhouse this holiday season. These solid wooden blocks feature distressed white script expressing words of inspiration and holiday messages including 'Joy,' 'Peace,' 'Believe,' and 'Merry Christmas.' The dark red finish has light distressing, especially at the edges. These blocks look great with buffalo check candles and wintry florals sitting or leaning on shelf and table displays. Blocks measure 3" high by 5.75" wide with a .5" depth.

Please note: This item features an assortment of designs which are each sold individually (not as a set). When you order the price break quantity of 24, you will receive 6 of each style when available.

Size: 3" H x 5.75" W x .5" Dp.
Colors: Red, white

These sturdy wooden blocks have a white finish with distressed plaid-style lines in black. Phrases in black text and script include "Merry Christmas" "Let's Cuddle" and "Tis the Season to be Warm & Cozy." The black and white color scheme pairs well with traditional Christmas colors, everyday décor, and more! Blocks measure 4.25" high by 6" wide by .75" deep and include a keyhole hanger.

Please note: This item features an assortment of designs which are each sold individually (not as a set). When you order the price break quantity of 3, you will receive 1 of each style when available.

Size: 4.25: H x 6" W x .75" Dp.

- Size: 6.5" H x 5.5" W x 1.5" D

column1: Live, Laugh, Poop Door Ornament, 3 Asstd.
column4:
The Live, Laugh, Poop Door Ornament assortment will liven up the bathroom. These fun wooden ornaments sport funny bathroom-related phrases in black text and script on a whitewash background. The ornaments are reversible sporting different sayings on each side. The ornaments are topped with a wooden beaded hanger and a black and white buffalo check bow at the top of each side of the ornament. One ornament reads ’Hope everything comes out Okay’ on one side and ‘text me if you run out of TP’ on the other. Another ornament reads ‘It doesn’t flush itself’ on one side and ‘Wash your hands’ on the other. The third ornament reads ‘Don’t be gross Wash your hands’ on one side and ‘Live Laugh Poop’ on the other.

Please note: This item features an assortment of designs which are each sold individually (not as a set). When you order the price break quantity of 12, you will receive 4 of each style when available.

Size: 4.5" H x 3" W x .25" Dp.

It reads 'A good day starts with Coffee and ends with Wine.' The shirt is designed and printed in Ohio and comes in five unisex sizes; S-XXL (see L99 for size S-XL). Pair this shirt with jeans and a cardigan for a more casual look or a cute skirt and sparkly jewelry for a fun night out with friends.
Cotton blend
Unisex: S-XXL
Heather raspberry

It is topped with a string of silver jingle bells on jute that is stretched across the top of the sign and the frame is wood with a dark finish. column4:

A shiny red, classic, 1950s style car with white wall wheels hauls a fresh, green pine tree on top. The car reads 'Village Toys' in white on the side. One reads ‘Get your fat pants ready’ while another states ‘when in doubt just add gravy.’ The third reads ‘Gobble till you wobble.’ Hang over chair spindles in the dining room for a little humor at meal-time or hang in the kitchen on knobs and hooks. column1: Golden Dog In Christmas Truck Wood Sign
column4: The Golden Dog in Christmas Truck Wood Sign is sure to bring joy to holiday décor this season with its bright red farm truck and golden pup. This festive sign features the tail end of a classic, shiny red pick-up. The truck is traveling into a snowy, count
